snippet: The attacker infiltrated a line of men signing up to fight with government forces in Anbar Province.
abstract: Suicide bomber detonates explosives among group of recruits who were joining Iraqi Army to fight Al Qaeda in Anbar Province; 22 recruits are killed and 31 are wounded.
lead_paragraph: The attacker infiltrated a line of men signing up to fight with government forces in Anbar Province.

headline.main: Bomber in Iraq Kills 22 Recruits Seeking to Fight Al Qaeda
headline.print_headline: Bomber in Iraq Kills 22 Recruits Seeking to Fight Al Qaeda
